org.cantaloupe.scoreboard

Class Team

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cantaloupe.scoreboard.Team

  • public class Team
extends java.lang.Object
    A class used to create a scoreboard team.
    Author:
    Dylan Scheltens

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      static class  Team.Option
      An enum containing the possible options for a team.

      An enum containing the possible option statuses for a team.
